data.title: Race Now at K1 Speed Indoor Kart Racing!
data.meta_description: Learn all about K1 Speed's race programs, include Arrive & Drive, Challenge GP, World Championship, Drift Night and More!
data.text:
Height Requirements

Junior minimum height requirement is 48″ (121.9 cm). Adult minimum height requirement is 58″ (147.3 cm). No mixed Adult and Junior races.

IMPORTANT: Meeting the height requirement is not a guarantee you’ll be able to race our karts. Drivers will be measured at the location and must be able to safely operate all elements of the kart. Final approval will be at management’s discretion.

The K1 Speed E-World Championship pits you against the best drivers from K1 Speed locations in the US and internationally for one of the biggest karting prize purses found anywhere on the planet.

One of our most popular events! Drift Night is for those who either love drifting, want to learn how to drift, or just want to try something new.
